Util.description: This is a util to run your DFA and NFA tests.
Util.example:
node testRunner.js converter.js [state-machine] [option]

	state-machine:		nfa or dfa
	option:			mention one of the option you want to execute

Note: 'state-machine' and 'option' are optional arguments for testRunner

--list.description: This option will give you list of all test cases

--only.description: This option let you run only one test case at a time
--only.example:
node testRunner.js converter.js --only [TEST_INDEX_NUMBER or TEST_NAME].
	node testRunner.js converter.js --only 1
	node testRunner.js converter.js --only 'This is my test case' 
	node testRunner.js converter.js [nfa | dfa] --only 'This is my test case'

--fail.description: This option let you run only failed test cases
--fail.example:
node testRunner.js converter.js [state-machine] --fail

	node testRunner.js converter.js --fail
	node testRunner.js converter.js [nfa | dfa] --fail
